alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 1:38PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, and Eastern San Miguel County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on north to south oriented area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing dust may reduce visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Quay County; Roosevelt County
